Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Delete the record with ID 16
DELETE FROM payment_gateways WHERE id = 16;

-- Insert with specific ID 15
INSERT INTO payment_gateways (
  id,
  name, 
  code, 
  type, 
  description,
  api_endpoint,
  api_key,
  api_secret,
  webhook_secret,
  is_active,
  config,
  supported_currencies,
  supported_countries,
  min_amount,
  max_amount,
  auto_approval,
  requires_kyc
) VALUES (
  15,
  ''IGPX Sportsbook'',
  ''igpx'',
  ''both'',
  ''IGPX Sportsbook integration for sports betting'',
  ''https://sp-int-9cr.6579883.com'',
  ''jackpotx'',
  ''NwFhr_KsyqpJwi62_Bc'',
  ''737e36e0-6d0b-4a67-aa50-2c448fe319f3'',
  true,
  ''{""api_version"": ""1.0.0"", ""client_username"": ""jackpotx""}'',
  ''{""USD""}'',
  ''{""ALL""}'',
  1.00,
  100000.00,
  true,
  false
);

-- Update the sequence to prevent conflicts
SELECT setval(''payment_gateways_id_seq'', (SELECT MAX(id) FROM payment_gateways));

-- Verify the insert
SELECT id, name, code, is_active FROM payment_gateways WHERE code = ''igpx'';
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Delete parent categories with no children

RETURNING id, title;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Verify all remaining sidebar categories have games
WITH category_games AS (
  SELECT 
    LOWER(category) as category_lower,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_active = true) as active_count
  FROM games
  GROUP BY LOWER(category)
)
SELECT 
  m.id,
  m.title,
  m.path,
  m.""parentId"",
  parent.title as parent_category,
  COALESCE(cg.active_count, 0) as active_games
FROM modules m
LEFT JOIN modules parent ON m.""parentId"" = parent.id
LEFT JOIN category_games cg ON LOWER(m.path) = cg.category_lower
WHERE m.""menuName"" = ''sidebar'' AND m.""parentId"" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY m.""parentId"", active_games DESC, m.id;
")

")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Show complete hierarchical structure
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN ""parentId"" IS NULL THEN ''ðŸ“ '' || title 
    ELSE ''  â””â”€ '' || title 
  END as structure,
  id,
  path,
  ""menuName"",
  ""parentId""
FROM modules
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN ""parentId"" IS NULL THEN id ELSE ""parentId"" END,
  ""parentId"" NULLS FIRST,
  id;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Final verification with counts
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_rows,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ""menuName"" = ''sidebar'' AND ""parentId"" IS NULL) as sidebar_parents,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ""menuName"" = ''sidebar'' AND ""parentId"" IS NOT NULL) as sidebar_children,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ""menuName"" = ''base'') as base_items
FROM modules;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
SELECT 
  id,
  title,
  path,
  ""menuName"",
  ""parentId"",
  CASE 
    WHEN path IS NULL THEN ''âŒ No path''
    ELSE ''âœ… '' || path
  END as href_status
FROM modules
ORDER BY

")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Check categories related to live casino
SELECT DISTINCT category
FROM games
WHERE LOWER(category) LIKE ''%live%'' OR LOWER(category) LIKE ''%blackjack%'' OR LOWER(category) LIKE ''%baccarat%'' OR LOWER(category) LIKE ''%roulette%''
ORDER BY category;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Select premium games for Live Exclusives (VIP tables, exclusive variants)
UPDATE games
SET category = ''live-exclusives''
WHERE is_active = true
  AND (
    -- Evolution Premium tables
    (provider LIKE ''%evolution%'' AND (
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%vip%'' OR 
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%salon%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%prive%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%grand%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%platinum%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%diamond%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%gold%''
    ))
    OR
    -- Pragmatic Premium tables
    (provider LIKE ''%pragmatic%'' AND (
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%mega%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%powerup%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%fortune%'' OR
      LOWER(name) LIKE ''%grand%''
    ))
    OR
    -- Game shows (all are exclusive entertainment)
    LOWER(name) LIKE ''%crazy time%'' OR
    LOWER(name) LIKE ''%monopoly%'' OR
    LOWER(name) LIKE ''%mega wheel%'' OR
    LOWER(name) LIKE ''%candyland%'' OR
    LOWER(name) LIKE ''%lightning storm%'' OR
    LOWER(name) LIKE ''%deal or no deal%'' OR
    LOWER(name) LIKE ''%funky time%''
  );

-- Show what we created
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as total, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_active = true) as active
FROM games
WHERE category = ''live-exclusives''
GROUP BY category;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Check what categories exist now
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count
FROM games
WHERE is_active = TRUE
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 10;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Create live-exclusives category with premium games
-- We''ll duplicate some records so they appear in both categories
-- First, let''s just mark premium games as a tag/feature instead

-- Update games that should be in live-exclusives
-- These will be premium VIP tables and game shows
WITH premium_games AS (
  SELECT id FROM games
  WHERE is_active = true
    AND (
      -- Evolution Premium tables
      (provider LIKE ''%evolution%'' AND (
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%vip%'' OR 
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%salon%'' OR
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%grand%'' OR
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%platinum%'' OR
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%diamond%''
      ))
      OR
      -- Pragmatic Premium tables
      (provider LIKE ''%pragmatic%'' AND (
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%mega%'' OR
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%powerup%'' OR
        LOWER(name) LIKE ''%fortune%''
      ))
      OR
      -- All game shows
      category = ''gameshow''
    )
  LIMIT 100
)
-- For now, let''s just count how many we would have
SELECT COUNT(*) as potential_live_exclusives FROM premium_games;
")
